Title: Recipe for Death II: Kiss the Cook
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Brian Hennelly, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam makes his own action movie, but an unlikely replacement steps in when Barry goes missing for playing the lead.
